title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Blended Learning Design for Architectural Education in the Digital Age: Language

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Architectural Terminology and Digital Tool Usage
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can interpret technical documents using architectural terminology with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can effectively present architectural project design ideas at least three times using online collaboration tools.
Learners can complete two or more assignments that visually represent architectural concepts using digital fabrication tools (e.g., 3D modeling).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
